# Potenser og rødder

## Regneregler:
$$
\begin{gather}
& a^0=1
& a^r \cdot a^s = a^{r+s}
& \frac{a^r}{a^s} = a^{r-s}
& a^{-r} = \frac{1}{a^r} \\
& a^{\frac{1}{r}} = \sqrt[r]{a}
& (a^n)^m = a^{n \cdot m}
& \frac{a^r}{b^r} = \left( \frac{a}{b}\right)^r
& (a \cdot b)^r = a^r \cdot b^r
\end{gather}
$$

## 
Udregn tallene nedenfor i hånden. Brug evt. multiplikationstabellen.

$$
\begin{gather}
&
\begin{aligned}
&\text{a.} \ 5^3 \\
&\text{b.} \ 3^5 \\
&\text{c.} \ 2^{-2} \\
&\text{d.} \ 3^3+3^2+3^1 \\
&\text{e.} \ 500^0 \\
&\text{f.} \ \sqrt{3^2+4^2} \\
&\text{g.} \ \sqrt{25} \\
&\text{h.} \ \sqrt[3]{27}\\
&\text{i.} \ \sqrt[5]{32}\\
&\text{j.} \ 2^2 \cdot 2^3 \\
&\text{k.} \ 6^{-3} \cdot 6^2 \\
&\text{l.} \ \frac{7^{10}}{7^8} \\
&\text{m.} \ 16^{1/2} \\
\end{aligned}
&
\begin{aligned}
&\text{n.} \ 8^{1/3} \\
&\text{o.} \ 9^{1/2} \cdot 9^{1/2}  \\
&\text{p.} \ (2^2)^2 \\
&\text{q.} \ (2 \cdot 3)^3 \\
&\text{r.} \ \left( \frac{1}{2}\right)^2\\
&\text{s.} \ 4^3 \\
&\text{t.} \ 2^8 \\
&\text{u.} \ 5^{-1} \\
&\text{v.} \ 3 \cdot 10^2 \\
&\text{w.} \ 4.7 \cdot 10^5 \\
&\text{x.} \ 2 \cdot 10^3 + 5 \cdot 10^2 + 3 \cdot 10^1 + 7\cdot 10^0 \\
&\text{y.} \ \sqrt{81} \\
&\text{z.} \ \sqrt[3]{1000} \\
\end{aligned}
\end{gather}
$$
